description:
Clean Studio Space in town home, near public transportation and 30-45 minutes from Timesquare And Madison Square Garden in Manhattan Via Subway/Metro. 20-30 Minutes to Yankee Stadium.

Nice & Cozy

Everything within the rented studio

I'm always available either by phone or text.

Williamsbridge Residential area, Private and Clean. Public Park only a few minutes away, great for morning runs.

Close & convenient transportation to and from New York City; Central Park, Park Avenue,  The Metropolitan Museum,  Rockefeller Center, Times Square, Empire State Building and Statue of Liberty.

This neighborhood has: Shopping; VIM, Footlocker Restaurants & Diners.
name: Nice&Cozy Private Studio Bronx, NY
